1.0.name: wordpress/rss-this
1.0.description:
RSS This Plugin will turn your normal WordPress page into a blog roll from an RSS feed.

Demo

How To Use: - Install the plugin - Place this shortcode where you want the feed to show: [rss-this uri="feed URL here" maxitems="99"] - If you want to get a feed from a wordpress site, simply use the domain name and add /feed at the end, for example: [rss-this uri="http://smartcatdesign.net/feed" maxitems="99"]
